channel.title: Apps on JOONBUM LEE
channel.description: Recent content in Apps on JOONBUM LEE

item.title: SHINY APP: Comparison of speeding measures across 104 traveled ways
item.description: This Shiny app allows users to test/visualize relationships between roadway characteristics and speeding measures across 104 traveled ways. This app requires authentication.

item.title: SHINY APP: Drivers' sensation seeking, glance, and driving behavior
SHINY APP: Roadway characteristics and speeding behavior
item.description: This Shiny app allows users to test/visualize relationships between roadway characteristics and speeding measures across 104 traveled ways. This app requires authentication.
